hillbillies.model

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage Tasks for a faction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scheduler()
      Creates a new empty scheduler.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        public void schedule(Task task)
        Adds a task to the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        task - | The task that will await execution.
        Postconditions:
      • The scheduler will contain the task
            new.getAllTasks().contains(task)
      • The task will contain this scheduler in it's schedulers.
            (new task).getSchedulers().contains(this)

      • isTaskAvailable

        public boolean isTaskAvailable()
        Checks whether a task is available for execution.
        Returns:
        True if a task is available which hasn't been assigned yet.
            result == (for some task in this.getAllTasks():
                          !task.isAssigned())

      • getTask

        public Task getTask(Unit unit)
             throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Gets the task with the highest priority for execution.
        Effect:
        The task will have the unit as assigned unit.
            result.setAssignedUnit(unit)
        Returns:
        The task with highest priority that is not yet assigned.
            for (Task task : this.getAllTasks())
              if (!task.isAssigned())
                  result.getPriority() > task.getPriority()
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - | If there are no tasks for execution | !this.isTaskAvailable()

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask(Task task)
        Removes a task.
        Parameters:
        task - The task that must be removed from the scheduler.
        Postcondition:
        The task will be removed from the scheduler.
            !new.getAllTasks().contains(task)
        Effect:
        Remove this scheduler from the task.
            task.removeScheduler(this)

      • rebuildTask

        public void rebuildTask(Task task)
        Rebuild the task list, used when a task changes priority.
        Parameters:
        task - | The task that changed priority.
        Postconditions:
      • The task will be in allTasks
            this.getAllTasks().contains(task)
      • The allTasks list will be sorted again.
            getAllTasks.isSorted()

        @Basic
public java.util.Iterator<Task> getAllTasksIterator()
        Returns an iterator over all tasks this scheduler controls.

public java.util.stream.Stream<Task> getAllTasksStream()
        Returns a stream over all tasks this scheduler controls.

      • getAllTasks

        @Basic
public SortedLinkedList<Task> getAllTasks()
        Returns a list of all tasks this scheduler controls.

      • containsAllTasks

        public boolean containsAllTasks(java.util.Collection<Task> tasks)
        Returns whether or not this schedulers controls all given tasks.
        Parameters:
        tasks - The tasks to check.
        Returns:
        True if this scheduler contains all given tasks, false otherwise.
            result == this.getAllTasks().containsAll(tasks)

      • replace

        public void replace(Task original,
                    Task replacement)
        Replace a task with the given replacement.
        Parameters:
        original - The task to replace.
        replacement - The replacement task.
        Effects:
      • If the original is assigned, it's interrupted.
            if (original.isAssigned()) original.interrupt()
      • The original is removed.
            this.removeTask(original)
      • The replacement is added.
            this.schedule(replacement)

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates this scheduler.
        Postcondition:
        This scheduler won't contain any tasks.
            new.getAllTasks().isEmpty()
